Why do Avast and Kaspersky antivirus software detect the software as malware or a virus?

Avast and Kaspersky may flag the software as "not-a-virus" or "PUP" (Potentially Unwanted Program), which are warnings that you are installing mining software, which may be installed by a third party to exploit your PC. These are false positives, and the software is not actually malware or a virus.
